mapper.insert: insert into orderlist (order_num, orderlist_qty, orderlist_sum, goods_num) select #{orderNum}, c.qty, c.qty * g.goods_price as price_sum , g.goods_num from cart c, goods g, member m where m.member_num = c.member_num and c.goods_num = g.goods_num and m.member_num = #{memberNum} and g.goods_num = #{goodsNum}
mapper.select: select g.goods_num, g.goods_name, m.order_price from goods g, member_order m, orderlist o where m.order_num = #{orderNum} and m.member_num = #{memberNum} and g.goods_num = o.goods_num and o.order_num = m.order_num
select * from orderlist where order_num = #{orderNum} order by order_num
